set(THIS_PROJECT EditorCommon)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

set (SourceGroup_SharedEditorCode_Editor_
	../../Editor/Objects/DisplayContext.cpp
	../../Editor/Objects/DisplayContext.h

	../../Editor/RenderHelpers/AxisHelper.h

source_group("Shared Editor Code %28Editor%29" FILES ${SourceGroup_SharedEditorCode_Editor_})


# Support unity build with uber files
set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_Events} ${SourceGroup_SharedEditorCode_Editor_}  )

set(Uber_MFCDependent_cpp ${SourceGroup_QViewPort}  )
enable_unity_build( "Uber_MFCDependent.cpp" Uber_MFCDependent_cpp )

set(Uber_QPropertyTree_cpp ${SourceGroup_Controls_QPropertyTree}  )
enable_unity_build( "Uber_QPropertyTree.cpp" Uber_QPropertyTree_cpp )

set(Uber_QtWidgets_cpp ${SourceGroup_Controls_CurveEditor} ${SourceGroup_Controls_Timeline} ${SourceGroup_DrawingPrimitives}  )
enable_unity_build( "Uber_QtWidgets.cpp" Uber_QtWidgets_cpp )

set(Uber_Serialization_cpp ${SourceGroup_Root} ${SourceGroup_Serialization} ${SourceGroup_Serialization_Decorators}  )
enable_unity_build( "Uber_Serialization.cpp" Uber_Serialization_cpp )


set (SOURCES
	${NoUberFile}
	${Uber_MFCDependent_cpp}
	${Uber_QPropertyTree_cpp}
	${Uber_QtWidgets_cpp}
	${Uber_Serialization_cpp}
)
#END-FILE-LIST

# Enable use MFC as Shared Library
set(CMAKE_MFC_FLAG 2)

# Common macro for enable QT5 CMake specific settings
custom_enable_QT5()

include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )
include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../Editor )
include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../Editor/Include )
include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../EditorCommon )

add_definitions(-DNOT_USE_CRY_MEMORY_MANAGER)
add_definitions(-DPLUGIN_EXPORTS)
add_definitions(-DEDITOR_COMMON_EXPORTS)
add_definitions(-D_USRDLL)
add_definitions(/EHsc)

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SOURCES})
set_property( TARGET ${THIS_PROJECT} PROPERTY ENABLE_EXPORTS ON)

# Use the Widgets module from Qt 5.
target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} Qt5::Widgets)

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
